general.description: Kan'ar is a class-O world with a large population and an extensive marine biology research community. A lot of underwater research and study goes on here, and like many class-O worlds, it is a large producer of medicine. Although the main focus is industrial and research, a deep sea zoo attracts visitors from afar.
general.bar: This bar is a fairly typical underwater bar with built-in overhead aquarium. Plenty of scientists inside of it arguing and talking about what they see, however.
